entry.title: $1750 // Recently Renovated, Spacious 1 Bdrm-1/2 blk to subway-Utilities Inc (W
entry.content:
Listing is for a spacious 1 bedroom BASEMENT apartment for rent in a quiet and residential neighborhood in Woodside, Queens. NO BROKER FEES.
Apartment was gut renovated just a few years ago and is well maintained.
Please note listing price does not include furniture that is pictured. Apartment will be empty, however, if interested can negotiate to include furniture as well.
$1,750 Rent includes utilities (heat, water, electricity). Apartment is available immediately.
> There are windows in the living room as well as bedroom (see pictures). It is super close (half a block only) to the R/M Norther Blvd subway stop (subway is at the end of the same block as the house). A quick 15-20 minutes ride gets you into midtown Manhattan. Also have access to other train lines (E, F, 7) including express lines by taking the subway 2 stops further into Queens to Jackson heights/Roosevelt avenue.
> Entire apartment was gut renovated just a few years ago with modern high end finishes and is very well maintained.
> - Spacious Kitchen/Living Room with 2 windows providing plenty of natural light. Kitchen with stainless steel appliances, granite countertop, huge sink, European style cabinets with soft close feature.
> - Big modern bathroom with rain shower head, Kohler toilet, glass mosaic tiles and other sleek fixtures.
> - Large bedroom with a closet and 2 windows providing natural light. 2 big his/hers closets in the hallway. Recessed lighting in the entire apartment.
>
> Not your typical tiny rental apartment made of poor quality cheap material. This is a rarely found gem in a great location...1/2 block to subway, close to Steinway area restaurants & bars as well as plethora of ethnic food restaurants in Jackson Heights/Elmhurst, close to Manhattan, shopping, highways, airports, etc.
>
> Monthly Rent: $1750 (includes all utilities such as heating, water & electricity). NO BROKER FEES
>
> MAX 2 occupants. Sorry NO pets allowed. Quiet neighborhood with lovely families around so no party animals please. Should be able to supply good reference letter from current landlord, pay stub/proof of employment & credit report.
> Apartment is available immediately.
